meaning_str.bing:
n. 人口；人口数量；族群；（统称）某领域的生物
网络. 总体；群体；种群

人口；人口数量；族群；（统称）某领域的生物

（地区、国家等的）人口；人口数量；某领域的生物；族群；人口；[统计]总体；母体；[天文]星族；[物理]布居数

1.en: Other times, factors ranging from climate change to the resurgence of a prey population translate into sharks showing up in greater numbers.
1.cn: 其他的时候，鲨鱼出现的因素包括气候变化，以及食物数量的增加也会导致了鲨鱼大量出现。

2.en: Nonetheless, he notes, they turn out on voting day in the same proportion as the rest of the population.
2.cn: 不过，他指出，在选举投票的时候，他们的份量与其他非移民人口一样。

3.en: A similar fate awaits any population exposed long enough to a new flu strain to which it has no immunity, experts believe.
3.cn: 专家们相信，任何没有免疫力的人群暴露于新的流感病毒株足够长的时间都经历相似的命运。

0.en: This is one way. Plan B, a population bomb.
0.cn: 这是一个办法B计划，超级人口炸弹。

1.en: So Valentine's gonna take care of the population problem himself.
1.cn: 于是瓦伦丁打算自己解决人口问题。

2.en: Even today, still 25 percent of the world's population of 7 billion can't read, which is about 2 billion people.
2.cn: 甚至到今天，70亿人口当中，还有25%的人不识字，这大约是20亿人口。

3.en: Like us, they appear to have a population growth rate that's unsustainable.
3.cn: 向我们一样，他们也有过度的人口增长。

4.en: Thirty-five years ago, this was a small town with a population of 300,000 people.
4.cn: 三十五年前，这里只是一个小镇，人口仅有三十万。

5.en: He also makes me wonder how our food machine will be able to keep up with our growing hungry population.
5.cn: 他也让我们思考我们的食品机器是如何跟上人口增长的步伐？

6.en: It's growing wealth and dynamism has created an incredible population explosion in an already expanding city.
6.cn: 日增的财富与活力造成了这个已然膨胀的城市惊人的人口激增。

7.en: With a population of over twelve million people, the French capital is at the heart of the Ile-de-France region.
7.cn: 拥有超过一千两百万人口，是法国的首都，位在法兰西岛的心脏地带。

8.en: He's a plague, Tony. He invades planets. He takes what he wants. He wipes out half the population. He sent Loki.
8.cn: 他就像瘟疫，托尼。他入侵星球。想拿什么就拿什么。抹去半数人口。当初是他派洛基来的。

9.en: By 2030, 350 million people, the population of the United States, are expected to move from the countryside to the cities.
9.cn: 到2030年，预计有三亿五千万人，相当于美国的人口总量，将会从农村迁移到城市。

10.en: These forces are using chemical weapons on their own people, torturing the opposition, and starving huge segments of the population.
10.cn: 政府军使用化学武器攻击自己的人民，折磨异议人士，让全国绝大多数人口忍饥挨饿。

11.en: World population, PC placements, the archive of all the medical literature, Moore's law, the old way of sequencing, and here's all the new stuff.
11.cn: 世界人口，PC配置，医学文献档案，摩尔定律，旧的测序方式，然后是这些新玩意。

12.en: Now look, as long as we continue to increase the population, we're going to have to continue to grow and eat genetically modified foods, and that's the only position that I'll take today.
12.cn: 随着人口不断增长，我们会不得不使用转基因产品，这是我的唯一立场。

13.en: If we do not reduce our population ourselves, there's only two ways it can go: The host kills the virus, or the virus kills the host. Either way…
13.cn: 如果我们不减少人口，就只有两种后果：宿主杀了病毒，或者病毒杀了宿主。两者之一……

14.en: In fact, if you friended every person on the site, you'd have 800 million friends. That's twice the population of the united states.
14.cn: 事实上,如果你把国内所有的人都加为好友的话，你就会有8亿多个朋友了，那可比美国人口总人数的两倍还要多。

15.en: It is predicted to the city's population will be 50 million by 2050, which means every New Year's Eve celebration in Beijing will just keep getting bigger.
15.cn: 根据预测，北京的城市人口到2050年会达到5000万，这意味着北京每年的除夕庆典会越来越盛大。

16.en: Hong Kong truly is a vertical city. Because of its geography, space is at a premium which means it has one of the highest population densities in the world.
16.cn: 香港的确是一个垂直城市。由于其地理条件，香港的空间十分宝贵，这意味着香港的人口密度在全球名列前茅。

17.en: First things first, we all know that China is a developing country, it has large population and it is really hard to manage, especially after world war 2, almost perished.
17.cn: 首先，地球人都知道，中国是一个发展中国家，她有着众多的人口，管理起来有很大的难度，尤其是在二战之后，中国可谓是废墟上重建起了家园。

18.en: Which suggests either a remarkable passivity among the, I assume, 24 to 36 residents of this building, based on the number of mailboxes and given typical urban population density or a shared delusion of functionality.
18.cn: 这就说明要么这楼的24到36户人家，我假设的，基于邮箱的个数和典型的城市人口密度得出的都特别懒散，要么都同时产生功能性错觉。

19.en: I think we have to be honest with ourselves. There was definitely a marketing element to it. I mean, he's a hometown guy. The area has a significant Asian-American population. And the way it played out. You know, people went bonkers for that.
19.cn: 说实话我们得对自己坦诚一些，签林书豪进来肯定是考虑到了市场因素。我的意思是说他是我们自己家乡人，这里有很大比重的亚裔人口。一切都证明了确实是那样的，湾区的球迷为他疯狂。
